Reviews.Title: “good for family”
Reviews.Author: ranjan1967
Reviews.Content: recently dec 2011 six family visited dubai stay hotel experiences location wise markets metro station lots restaurants vicinity costly breakfast witch complimentary studio apartments facilities cooking washing machine ironing faced bit poor maintenance lack power

Reviews.Title: “Good location, Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: MeghaChaddah
Reviews.Content: hotel located 5 minute walk al metro station close dubai ie diera karama market 1520 min walk hotel spacious equipped washer microwave cooking facilities refrigerator bathroom bit tired looking nevertheless price charged awesome value money lastly breakfast included extremely extensive variety breads croissants eggs fruits cereals indian dishes stay reasonable cost city pricey stayed dubai reasonable connected easy access public transport

Reviews.Title: “Value for your Dollar”
Reviews.Author: carol f
Reviews.Content: recommend looking affordable clean accommodation 3 adults sharing husband daughter apartment 2 size bedroom lounge sofa bed kitchen staff friendly accomodating family

Reviews.Title: “4 nights at rolla :)”
Reviews.Author: Jiten D
Reviews.Content: perfect getaway indian serviced apartments located rolla street bur 57 minutes walk metro loved breakfast day special indian meal definitely return family highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for the stopover stay”
Reviews.Author: Susan R
Reviews.Content: stayed nights recommend city hotel convenient location 15 minutes drive airport hotel provide free shuttle airport metro station 5 minutes walk supermarkets restaurants plenty shops neighbourhood greek 15 minutes walk hotel clean it´s property quiet busy location furnished kitchenette plus cooked coffee stay staff helpfull polite provided quick servise city tour 5 minutes reception desk excellent breakfast perfect everyday choise dubai choose rolla residence

Reviews.Title: “3 nights in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Christine B
Reviews.Content: arrived rolla residence australia 700am immediately escorted offered glass orange juice found staff helpful friendly courteous clean beds comfortable pool roof views burj khalifa towards burj al arab free shuttle service airport excellent superb value money

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel. Real value for money”
Reviews.Author: Poorany
Reviews.Content: home trip stayed hotel staff excellent combination hotel service apartment nice help packing picked dropped transfer dubai real value moneyand stay trip dubai

Reviews.Title: “What can I say?!?!? A 5 stars place for a price next to nothing”
Reviews.Author: MaiUK
Reviews.Content: rolla residence fabulous experience arrived dubai holiday booked hotel online couldnt stay weve moved road rolla residence filthy luggage walked search stay husband rolla residence didnt enter cuz disappointed beleive stepped inside tell shown moving omg fantastic 5stars hotels smells clean looks clean wonderful staff weve agreed price moved waste money expensive hotel quality service rolla residence affordable price price amaizing decided door cuz adults kids rolla residence stay dubai stay dubai

Reviews.Title: “Rolla residence Dubai - value for money”
Reviews.Author: sajiseb
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days family location perfect bur dubai close visitors booking emails absolutely request advance payment spacious parking lot finding parking slot visitors hassle space taxis stop unless stop traffice lane didnt mind doing spacious apartments restaurant buffet breakfast included tariff didnt offer choice staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Recommendable and nice 24-hours' check-in/check-out hotel”
Reviews.Author: MarioXP
Reviews.Content: booked hotel air emirates office choice traveled venice bangkok via dubai spent 23 hours dubai flights people arabian adventure engaged air emirates waited airport shuttle hotel arrived hotel 2 am greeted glass juice warm smile bell boy waiting spacey kitchen called studios ours nice clean comfortable bathroom breakfast indian western food liked extra special staff friendly professional hotel located 20 minutes walk downtown finally waited arabian adventure driver hours prior flight hotel drove airport organized

Reviews.Title: “comfortable”
Reviews.Author: RMSA
Reviews.Content: hotel maintained comfortable plush convenient 2 appointed kitchen tasty breakfast bit repetitive attentive waiters spend time hotel ideal feel slightly cramped view street hotel dry dusty didnt pool look inviting 24 hour supermarket pharmacy beauty salon laundromats shopping centre easy walking distance
